Name: acquisition_id
Description: The acquisition_id refers to the directory containing the ROI images for a slide. Together, the acquisition_id and the roi_id indicate the slide-ROI represented in the image.

Name: acquisition_instrument_model
Description: Manufacturers of an acquisition instrument may offer various versions (models) of that instrument with different features or sensitivities. Differences in features or sensitivities may be relevant to processing or interpretation of the data.

Name: acquisition_instrument_vendor
Description: An acquisition instrument is the device that contains the signal detection hardware and signal processing software. Assays generate signals such as light of various intensities or color or signals representing the molecular mass.

Name: antibodies_path
Description: Relative path to file with antibody information for this dataset.

Name: area_normalized_ion_dose_unit
Description: Area normalized ion dose unit

Name: area_normalized_ion_dose_value
Description: Number of primary ions delivered to the sample per unit area

Name: contributors_path
Description: Relative path to file with ORCID IDs for contributors for this dataset.

Name: data_path
Description: Relative path to file or directory with instrument data. Downstream processing will depend on filename extension conventions.

Name: data_precision_bytes
Description: Numerical data precision in bytes

Name: description
Description: Free-text description of this assay.

Name: donor_id
Description: HuBMAP Display ID of the donor of the assayed tissue.

Name: dual_count_start
Description: Threshold for dual counting.

Name: end_datetime
Description: Time stamp indicating end of ablation for ROI

Name: execution_datetime
Description: Start date and time of assay, typically a date-time stamped folder generated by the acquisition instrument. YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm, where YYYY is the year, MM is the month with leading 0s, and DD is the day with leading 0s, hh is the hour with leading zeros, mm are the minutes with leading zeros.

Name: is_targeted
Description: Specifies whether or not a specific molecule(s) is/are targeted for detection/measurement by the assay.

Name: max_x_width_unit
Description: Units of image width of the ROI acquisition

Name: max_x_width_value
Description: Image width value of the ROI acquisition

Name: max_y_height_unit
Description: Units of image height of the ROI acquisition

Name: max_y_height_value
Description: Image height value of the ROI acquisition

Name: number_of_antibodies
Description: Number of antibodies

Name: number_of_channels
Description: Number of fluorescent channels imaged during each cycle.

Name: operator
Description: Name of the person responsible for executing the assay.

Name: operator_email
Description: Email address for the operator.

Name: pi
Description: Name of the principal investigator responsible for the data.

Name: pi_email
Description: Email address for the principal investigator.

Name: pixel_dwell_time_unit
Description: Pixel dwell time unit.

Name: pixel_dwell_time_value
Description: Resident time of primary ion beam on each pixel.

Name: pixel_size_x_unit
Description: Width unit of the pixel or voxel measurement.

Name: pixel_size_x_value
Description: Width value of the pixel or voxel measurement (distinct from the image resolution_x_value).

Name: pixel_size_y_unit
Description: Length unit of the pixel or voxel measurement.

Name: pixel_size_y_value
Description: Length value of the pixel or voxel measurement (distinct from the image resolution_y_value).

Name: preparation_instrument_model
Description: The model number/name of the instrument used to prepare the sample for the assay

Name: preparation_instrument_vendor
Description: The manufacturer of the instrument used to prepare the sample for the assay.

Name: primary_ion
Description: Primary ion.

Name: primary_ion_current_unit
Description: Primary ion current unit, typically nA or pA

Name: primary_ion_current_value
Description: Primary ion current value.

Name: protocols_io_doi
Description: DOI for protocols.io referring to the protocol for this assay.

Name: reagent_prep_protocols_io_doi
Description: DOI for protocols.io referring to the protocol for preparing reagents for the assay.

Name: resolution_x_unit
Description: The unit of measurement of width of a pixel.(nm)

Name: resolution_x_value
Description: The width of a pixel. (Akoya pixel is 377nm square)

Name: resolution_y_unit
Description: The unit of measurement of height of a pixel. (nm)

Name: resolution_y_value
Description: The height of a pixel. (Akoya pixel is 377nm square)

Name: roi_description
Description: A description of the region of interest (ROI) captured in the image.

Name: roi_id
Description: Multiple images (1-n) are acquired from regions of interest (ROI1, ROI2, ROI3, etc) on a slide. The roi_id is a number from 1-n representing the ROI captured on a slide.

Name: section_prep_protocols_io_doi
Description: DOI for protocols.io referring to the protocol for preparing tissue sections for the assay.

Name: segment_data_format
Description: This refers to the data type, which is a "float" for the IMC counts.

Name: signal_type
Description: Type of signal measured per channel (usually dual counts)

Name: start_datetime
Description: Time stamp indicating start of ablation for ROI

Name: tissue_id
Description: HuBMAP Display ID of the assayed tissue.

Name: version
Description: Version of the schema to use when validating this metadata.
